content.title: Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme
content.details: Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme is a flagship program launched by the West Bengal Government in February 2021, to provide financial assistance to women from economically weaker sections of society, for the empowerment of women in the age group of 25-60 years and enrolled in ‘Swasthya Sathi’ provides ₹ 1000/- every month to women from SC/ST households and ₹ 500/- per month from others. Over 1.5 crore applications were received and processed. The scheme aims to empower women and make them financially independent by providing them with a one-time grant to buy essential goods and services.
benefits: For women from Scheduled Caste / Scheduled Tribes Households: ₹ 1,000/- per month
For women from households other than SC/ST households: ₹ 500/- per month.
eligibility: The applicant should be a resident of West Bengal.
The applicant should be a woman.
The age of the applicant should be between 25 - 60 years.
The household of the applicant should be enrolled under the 'Swasthyasathi' scheme.

The applicant should not be a government employee in permanent employment/ retired government employee of Central/ State Government, Statutory Bodies, Government Undertakings, Panchayats, Municipal Corporations/ Municipalities, Local Bodies, teaching and non-teaching employees of Government aided Educational Institutions, etc. receiving regular salary/ pension.
content.application_process: Offline. The scheme’s application form will be available free of cost at the Duare Sarkar Camps. The applicant will submit the filled-in, duly signed application form at one of the Duare Sarkar Camps, along with the self-attested copies of the required documents.
documents_required: Bank Account Details: Self-attested photocopy of the page of the bank book which provides details of the account holder's name, account no., bank address, IFS Code and MICR No. The bank account should be a single bank account in name of the eligible adult female member only.
Colored passport-size photograph of the applicant.

Self-declaration duly signed by the applicant to the effect: a) That she is a resident of West Bengal b) That she does not earn any monthly remuneration/pension from any regular job of State Government, Statutory Bodies, Government Undertakings, Panchayats, Municipal Corporations/ Municipalities, Local Bodies, Government aided Educational Institutions, etc. c) Information furnished by her in the application form is true

faqs.question: What Is The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Lakshmir Bhandar scheme is a financial assistance program launched by the government of West Bengal to provide a one-time grant of Rs. 1000 to women from economically weaker sections of society.

faqs.question: Who Is Eligible For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: Women from economically weaker sections of society who are permanent residents of West Bengal and are not beneficiaries of any other similar government scheme are eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: Is There Any Fee To Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no fee to apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Grant Amount Under The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: The grant amount under the scheme is Rs. 1000.

faqs.question: Can I Use The Grant Amount For Any Purpose?
faqs.answer: The grant amount can be used to purchase essential goods and services.

faqs.question: How Will I Receive The Grant Amount Under The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: The grant amount will be transferred directly to your bank account.

faqs.question: How Long Does It Take To Receive The Grant Amount Under The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: If your application is approved, you will receive the grant amount within a few days.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme If I Am Already A Beneficiary Of Another Government Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot apply for the scheme if you are already a beneficiary of another similar government scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Age Limit To Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: There is no age limit to apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Objective Of The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to women from economically weaker sections of society and to help them become self-sufficient and independent.

faqs.question: What Is The Deadline To Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: There is no deadline to apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: Can I Check The Status Of My Application For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can check the status of your application on the official website.

faqs.question: What Should I Do If My Application For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme Is Rejected?
faqs.answer: If your application is rejected, you can reapply after correcting the errors or providing additional documents.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme If I Am A Student?
faqs.answer: Yes, as long as you meet the eligibility criteria, you can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: Can Men Apply For The Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, the scheme is only for women.

faqs.question: Can I Withdraw The Grant Amount In Cash?
faqs.answer: No, the grant amount will be transferred directly to your bank account.
